---
Suites: IDAA
Test
---
!3 Purpose
The fixture should create a database table based on a query the tester supplies. The data can then be used by any other test page.
The counterpart of this fixture is the ..FrontPage.ExamplesJac.TestJac.TryOutDatabaseStuff.TryOutIdaaOnlyTable.DropTable fixture, which drops the specified table.

!3 Limitations
By design, the create table will only accept an indication for the table. All table names will be prefixed.

|script                 |create table  |crttab                |
|set database connection|${dbconnection}                      |
|set table name         |${demotab}                           |
|set database           |${database}                          |
|set accelerator        |${accelerator}                       |
|add column             |ROW_ID        |data type |VARCHAR(15)|
|add column             |NAME          |data type |VARCHAR(30)|
|ensure                 |create table  |${demotab}|is   |OK   |
|show                   |table name for|${demotab}            |
|ensure                 |table         |${demotab}|exists     |
|check                  |error message |No errors encountered             |
|show                   |get version                          |
